name: Everything has a greater cost then we know it
name_original: Everything has a greater cost then we know it
description:
This is a little game about trying to not die while still trying to save up towards your goal of one million dollars, as days pass prices increase and you have to find ways to survive days and get a new high score .when you are using commands make sure to put in a space after each command. also when you are using the buy command. here is the format. "buy air " with a space at the end.  or use it as "buy air, water, health " remember the space afterwards.
Enjoy! 

here are the commands: 

Help - display all commands

Shop - display shop items and prices

buy - buy things from the shop

day - display time of day and what day it is

wait - waits 1 day

quit - closes the game

clear - clears all of the text in console

stats - shows the stats of your air, water, health, cash

junk -  when prompted with a question type:  "q true / false / 1 / 2/ 3 / 4" and also if you type "q puase " the questions will stop and if you type "q unpuase " that will start the questions again. and also if you want to skip the question by typing "q skip "

more to come soon ~
